recipesJson.name: Blueberry Milk
recipesJson.author: MCrane81
recipesJson.description:
Malty, sweet blueberry milk with a hint of meringue. 

Deliciously fresh all day vape. 

If using in a tank, I'd recommend upping the SS to .75 to help carry through the blueberry.

reviews.text: Vaping this right now. I like to switch up flavors a lot each day but I can honestly say that on more than one occasion I have vaped this all day. Delicious malty, creamy, and sweet blueberry milk just as you would hope. Really like this one. Give it a try guys and gals.
